sentence.Network_en: The lissome birchbark canoe seemed to be a fish, so easily did it cut through the rolling black waves and ranks of ice.
sentence.Network_cn: 轻盈的桦皮舟像一条大鱼，在滚滚的黑色波涛和冰排中间飞一般地前进。

sentence.Network_en: We were schooner - rigged and rakish , with a long and lissome hull ( John Masefield )
sentence.Network_cn: 我们的船挂有大帆,流线形, 船身长,形态优美 ( 约翰梅斯菲尔德 )

sentence.Network_en: However, a filmmaker from South has succeeded in breaking the reserve of the lissome lass.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而一个来自南部的电影制片人却成功地打破了这个小姑娘的矜持.
